statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.OrderID , AA.ProductID , AA.ProductName , AA.ProductCode , AA.Option1 , AA.Option2 , AA.Bundle , AA.OrderQty , AA.SalePrice , AA.OrderAmt , AA.DiscountAmt , AA.CouponAmt , AA.DeliveryFee , AA.SupplyPrice , AA.SupplyAmt , AA.CancelYn , AA.CancelDate , AA.Currency , AA.LocalSalePrice
, PP.BrandID , BB.Name as BrandName
, ISNULL(SD.ShippedQty, 0) as ShippedQty
FROM dbo.TOrderItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TProduct PP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ProductID = PP.ID LEFT JOIN DBO.TBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON PP.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT AA.OrderID , BB.OrderItemID , SUM(BB.ShippedQty) as ShippedQty FROM dbo.TShipment AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TShipmentItem BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.ShipmentID WHERE AA.OrderID = #OrderID# GROUP BY AA.OrderID, BB.OrderItemID ) SD ON AA.OrderID = SD.OrderID WHERE AA.OrderID = #OrderID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TOrderItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
